articles.title: IMPOSING TARIFFS ON COUNTRIES IMPORTING VENEZUELAN OIL - The White House
articles.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency
articles.content: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (50 U.S.C. 1701 et seq.) (IEEPA)… [+8502 chars]
